title: PHY LAB
content: Is the checking of teachers for phy lab lenient .

comments.body: That phy lab sheet where we have to write answers of two experiments
Honestly depends on the teacher but most r lenient

I damn near failed that shit didn't know any experiment left my sheet empty answered the viva questions, the she showed me some shit on her phone and she's like tell me what that is im p sure got that wrong too (still an A in physics ü•∂)

I left my sheet empty because I  didn't know anything üôèüíÄ

Study properly, they were not lenient
They will fail.u if u don't write anything.
Yes. Write anything u know Abt the topic if u don't know the answer. They will give some marks
